Eau Claire ( News Release ) - The Eau Claire Fire Department was dispatched to a tour bus on fire in the 900 block of North Hastings Way around 7:55 a.m. Dispatchers reported the bus was being evacuated at the time of the call .
When firefighters arrived they found a tour bus in the southbound lane of Hastings Way along the shoulder of the roadway .
The bus driver reported he had a problem with one of the back tires and was on his way to change out buses when the fire started .
